questions.question_text:
A company uses Dynamics 365 Finance and Power BI. The company plans to analyze operational data for retail stores that they operate across the United States.

The company wants to analyze customer visit data based on the population in the areas where stores are located.

You need to recommend a Power BI visualization for the company.

Which Power BI visualization should you recommend?

An international hotel company implements Dynamics 365 Finance.

You need to help the hotel company identify email integration capabilities.

What are two valid use cases for sharing Dynamics 365 Finance documents with customers by using email integration? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

choices.C: The company sends statements to customers based on request.
choices.D: The company emails invoices to customers after their hotel stay.
choices.B: A customer registers a compliant online regarding their stay at any of the companyâ€™s hotels.
choices.A: Customers negotiate prices for hotel reservations with company agents by using their personal email addresses.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CD
Correct Answer should be C and D

Selected Answer: CD
C and D

questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT
-

A company has physical stores and an online shop. The company plans to implement Dynamics 365 Commerce.

You need to recommend a feature that will help the company improve product availability for stores without carrying excess stock.

What should you recommend to optimize distribution of stock? To answer, select the appropriate option in the answer area.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
answer is correct 
For improving product availability in physical stores without carrying excess stock, the more relevant feature would be Distributed Order Management (DOM) within Dynamics 365
Posted answer in the wrong Q
Cloud Point Of Sale: because It has a unique design that allows you to pair it up with the hardware station.

questions.question_text:
A retainer plans to deploy Dynamics 365 Commerce.

You need to be able to scan items and collect payments for sales in a store-by using a physical credit card device. The solution must run within a browser window.

What should you implement?

discussion.content: "Modern POS client can also communicate with peripheral devices, such as cash drawers, credit card readers, and printers, by using Hardware Station"

Selected Answer: A
A. Cloud Point of Sale (CPOS)

Selected Answer: D
Modern Point of Sale in Dynamics 365 Commerce is designed for in-store sales and transactions. It provides a modern and responsive user interface that can run within a browser window. It supports the integration of physical credit card devices for payment processing and allows for scanning items during the checkout process.

Selected Answer: A
selected wrong answer on accident, should be A: Cloud Point of Sale.

Selected Answer: C
agree with: Cloud Point of sale should be the correct answer as that is the only mode of service which is cloud based and will run in the browser
Cloud Point of sale should be the correct answer as that is the only mode of service which is cloud based and will run in the the browser
Cloud Point Of Sale: because It has a unique design that allows you to pair it up with the hardware station

questions.question_text:
A company uses Dynamics 365 Commerce.

The company needs to schedule several base Dynamics 365 Commerce reports.

The reports must print statistics about inventory sales from the previous week every Sunday night to a physical printer.

You need to identify the right tool.

Which tool should you use?

comments.content: Hi, could you provide source about where you find this paragraph?

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/fin-ops-core/dev-itpro/analytics/print-documents?context=%2Fdynamics365%2Fcontext%2Fcommerce

founded in this document. quit different with what Ronirso copied, possibly that MS had made some changes to the document within thses 2 months. But the idea is the same, SSRS is the main sourse of reporting and print. POWER BI was not mentioned

discussion.content:
SSRS is the right answer:
"You can print reports to various locations such as your screen, a printer, a file, or to an email. You can use SSRS reports to create parameterized views that support drill-down navigation. You can also embed hyperlinks from a report to finance and operations apps pages.
You can schedule reports to run periodically by using a batch job. SSRS reports can help you create precise compliance documents for your local regulatory needs."

Selected Answer: B
To schedule and print reports from Dynamics 365 Commerce at specific intervals, such as every Sunday night, you should use:

B. Microsoft SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS)

Selected Answer: B
Microsoft SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS) is a reporting tool that integrates with Dynamics 365 Commerce to create, schedule, and distribute reports. It allows you to schedule reports to run at specific intervals and can be configured to print reports to a physical printer.
